entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-35391: .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #267
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38180: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #269

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GC runs but working set remains the same? #90640
  • [8.0] French abbreviated month names not showing up as expected #90639
    8.0.0
  • [iOS] Make HybridGlobalization the default when nativeaot is enabled #90633
    9.0.0
  • Add XXXIsEnabled method generation to the LoggerMessage generator #90629
    Future
  • Awkward Time Format Patterns on Linux. No Space Before AM/PM Designator. #90627
    9.0.0
  • Custom Marshallers never use stateful GetPinnableReference on struct #90621
    9.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Generated methods will call both ConvertToManaged and ConvertToManagedFinally if present #90618
    9.0.0
  • Custom Marshaller shape docs need to be updated #90617
    8.0.0
  • WinHttpHandler assertion failure #90613
  • When a backing file for a MemoryMappedFile is no longer available, reading from or writing to it throws an uncatchable exception #90608
  • Allow SDKs to tweak the error message when ILLink fails #90607
  • tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource failing in CI #90605
  • [Test Failure]: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest_Http30.EventSource_ConnectionPoolAtMaxConnections_LogsRequestLeftQueue #90603
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate()) #90602
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Intrinsify Vector128.ExtractMostSignificantBits for floating element types #90600
    9.0.0
  • DOTNET_EnableAvx512F=0 does not disable Vector512.IsHardwareAccelerated in WSL #90598
    8.0.0
  • BinderTracingTest_ResolutionFlow test fails #90593
  • [API Proposal]: Interface dispatch cache to avoid method resolution at runtime #90592
  • Logging source generator should support generic methods (`SYSLIB1011` should be lifted) #90589
    Future
  • [debugger][mono] Tracking issue for debugger new features and improvements #90587
    9.0.0
  • Telemetry target fails in rc1 #90584
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #90580
  • Unit tests that pass on Windows, fail on Linux (Ubuntu). #90579
    8.0.0
  • NET8 breaking change due to TypeForwardedTo attribute missing for PEFileKinds #90578
    8.0.0
  • JsonConstructorAttribute not working for private/internal ctor in .NET 8.0 preview7 #90577
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe logs unintended events during rundown #90575
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ConfigurationExtensions.IsPresent(this IConfigurationSection?) #90574
  • ToFrozenDictionary function throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException exception in .Net 8 Pewview 7 #90567
    8.0.0
  • Lock contention in StackTrace/Exception.ToString() #90563
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Move Linker repo to Runtime repo #75278
    8.0.0
  • coreclr build crashes on Linux with newest clang 13 #65676
    8.0.0
  • [Profiler] Non-blocking garbage collections are not reported as induced #86541
    9.0.0
  • Define libc targeting plan #69361
    8.0.0
  • Make public surface area of different CoreLibs consistent #72594
    8.0.0
  • Make it easier to file issues for CI failures #44207
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT app crashes when run on a machine with an ETW session with GCHeapDump and Type keywords enabled #88491
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid codegen with Unsafe.As #90596
    8.0.0
  • NTLM 401 macOS (Apple sillicon) #82547
    Future
  • NTAuthentication.MakeSignature produces different thing on macOS, Windows and Linux #65678
    Future
  • PlatformNotSupportedException thrown for System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.NodeFor #90311
    8.0.0
  • AssemblyLoadContext not unloaded when server started and stopped #90114
  • Jit: reconsider policy for recursive inlines #41542
    Future
  • `HostApplicationBuilder` ctor enhancement #90604
  • [mono] Tests failing `System.Globalization.Calendars.IOS.Tests` on ios-like platforms #90497
    8.0.0
  • [EnC] FieldInfo.GetValue on a newly-added ValueType field crashes CoreCLR #76702
    9.0.0
  • Passing CancellationToken best practices #90507
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationManager is not trim compatible #49062
    Future
  • [wasm] Unable to get the value for a local when debugging a Blazor app #86395
    8.0.0
  • wasm][debugger] Refactor evaluateOnCallFrame #69639
    Future
  • Question about using NegotiateStream in linux and TokenImpersonationLevel #80846
    Future
  • Attributes.OnlyKeepUsed.NullableOnConstraints failing in dotnet-linker-tests #90431
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Win32 CreateProcess flags to ProcessStartInfo #90581
  • JsonConstructorAttribute not working with internal members. #90576
  • Assert failure: brick_table[b] != 0 #90452
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NO-MERGE / DESIGN DISCUSSION ONLY] Infra fixes for Ivan's JIT count test #90647
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Collapse PortableAppWithException test app into PortableApp #90645
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Pin chrome version for testing to 115.0.579.x #90644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Pin chrome version for testing to 115.0.579.x #90643
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Unify with logging category matching #90642
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Made threadstatic helper call sites slightly simpler (static ctor case) #90641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Setup internal feeds in internal builds #90637
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Add doc for the new invoker classes #90636
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/8.0] Return false from ComWrappers.Try... methods #90635
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add types with marshallers that implement every method from the marshaller shapes #90634
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix min alignment of structures with explicit layout. #90632
    area-Interop-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add timeouts to SendReceive tests #90631
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90628
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mono][ios] Revert LLVM mode for apple mobile tests #90624
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • (Draft) JIT: Substitute constant into loop testing variable where possible #90622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve filtering of candidate binding invocations in config binder gen #90619
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90616
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq.Expressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix support for non-public default constructors using JsonIncludeAttribute #90615
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Enable Yield_r* tests with full-AOT (llvm) #90614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix support for non-public default constructors using JsonIncludeAttribute #90612
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Set TasksConfiguration=RuntimeConfiguration for debugger tests #90611
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [workloads] Put quotes around GetFileName call when collecting telemetry #90606
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Assembly resolving adjustments. #90601
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [workloads] Put quotes around GetFileName call when collecting telemetry #90588
    needs-area-label
  • [ios] Add optimized property to the Native AOT sample app #90585
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Run InlineArray tests on the CI #90583
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement normalization functions #90582
    os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the error register in JIT_WriteBarrier. #90568
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix problems with `Assembler::ReflectionNotation()` #90565
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Reset OOB packages from September Release in the October Release #90561
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix profiler reason #90569
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Free segment event #90571
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations (#90285) #90337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Setup internal feeds in internal builds #90646
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • What is the expected behavior when a reference is missing? #90261
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Open up `EmbeddedXmlInfo` #90314
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Improvements to Banned APIs #90165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Unify with logging category matching #90559
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90630
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Setup internal feeds in internal builds #90638
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90446
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add doc for the new invoker classes #90536
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Improve profiled casts #90594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Return false from ComWrappers.Try... methods #90553
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Extract general syntax generation code to SyntaxFactoryExtensions and use where possible #90545
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Revert LLVM mode for apple mobile tests #90586
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #89502
    area-Build-mono
  • Use managed NTLM/SPNEGO on Apple platforms by default #89267
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Move iOS sim helix queue to MacOS 12 #90626
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix ToFrozenDictionary(selectors) on empty sources #90599
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections
  • Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90456
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Fix ToFrozenDictionary(selectors) on empty sources #90595
    area-System.Collections
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90573
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #90572
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Bump to RC2 #90557
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Fix NullableAttribute illink test failures #90449
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • gen0_bricks_cleared flag needs to be propagated when we change heap count #90457
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #90560
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0][manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #90562
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Notify jiterpreter when a method is freed #89980
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for `ldp`/`stp` optimizations #90534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add Pinned collection parameter type #90103
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add Caller Allocated Buffer collection marshaller and interface #90107
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [GC] Use RegisterFrozenSegment for STRESS_REGIONS #90523
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix queue count in rate limiters #90409
    area-System.Threading
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #89421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove AggressiveOpt from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef #90412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use non-generic `Memmove` for pointers in `String` #90383
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add a --path command line argument as an alternative to MONO_P… #90544
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Store pinned static fields in the Pinned Object Heap. #89895
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `process.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd()` never finishes for `dotnet build` in unit tests in certain situations on Windows #34653
  • [NETSDKE2E] [Regression]With 8.0.100-rc.1.23414.11 installed, the RID shows incorrectly on Linux Alpine3.18 Arm64 #34627
  • Native AOT produces useless `native` directory in build output #34619
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • Product version is always set to 1.0.0 #15771
  • System.Xaml not found in .NET 5.0 #15728
    Discussion
  • Cannot run dotnet tool from folder containing multiple project files. #15697
    Backlog
  • Unable to build release/5.0.1xx on Linux #15999
  • dotnet build with Microsoft.NETFramework.ReferenceAssemblies can't find 'Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll' #15712
  • File used by another process #33956

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable the backport flow similar to other repos #34654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove platform from output path #34651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add AdditionalRuntimeIdentifier if building from source #34650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Correct command model for nuget trust command and subcommands #34649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update onelocbuild to 8.0.1xx #34642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34640
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34639
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial commit for dotnet sln configuration cmd #34626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Copying the test project to the temporary folder is to change the hard coding of the tfm and package version #34624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update README.md #30085
    Area-WebSDK
  • One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support option to not include platform #34530
    untriaged
  • Allow overriding ServerGarbageCollection in WebSdk #22420
    Area-WebSDK
  • .NET 9 branding #34645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • correct command model for nuget trust command and subcommands #34613
    untriaged

Updated

  • Fix redist.csproj build failure on SLN rebuild in VS #34587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When transforming web.config check if target framework is .NET Framework. #34618
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • MSBuild terminal logger enamblement. #34606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Remove a nowarn line added for preview 1 #34345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • fix include, markdown lint #7468
  • Collection literals working group notes 2023-08-11 #7458

Updated

  • Fix links in enums.md #7465

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# Laungage Service is crash if UNITY project contains class named "Program" inherit MonoBehaviour #69525
    17.8
  • Partial method '..' must have an implementation part because it has accessibility modifiers.RoslynCS8795 #69522
  • `ImmutableList<T>` on net7 and compiler-expression-conversions. #69521
  • Compiler should not use `Environment` type #69516
  • C# compilation performance regression in latest 7.0.400 SDK #69515
  • C# - When jumping to definition in a decompiled or source link file for the first time, the cursor is always at the beginning of file #69514
    17.8 P4
  • False-positive CS0656 error when LangVersion=11, TargetFramework=net6.0 and PolySharp is installed #69527
  • When saving, some Code Cleanup fixers modify C# source files excluded from compilation #69512
    17.8 P4

Closed

  • Collection expressions need an unnecessary brace if a cast expression is a generic type with a type alias #69508
  • Collection expressions codefix changes behaviour for ImmutableArray<T> #69507
  • [Bug]: Autocomplete for `override` methods does not produce anything #68540
    17.8 P4
  • Prefer simple using statement setting not respected when "No" #68682
  • Use background work indicator for Go To Implementation #69390
    18.0
  • Use background work indicator for Go To Definition #69389
    18.0
  • Make brackets of class and methods bold #68582
    Backlog
  • Documents from different projects with the same path are considered the same since 4.6.0 #68814
  • VS Pro 2022 (64-bit) v17.5.3 - Feature 'Symbol Search' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #67598

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "remove positive Unary expressions to avoid confusion in addit… #69533
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Collection expressions: emit Array.Empty<T>() for [] with tar… #69532
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test removing check #69531
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix reassigned-variable-underlining with primary constructors #69530
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include documentation in MetadataReference creation #69529
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update 17.7 servicing branch queue #69528
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extract a shared helper for walking statements for a few analyzers #69524
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adjust IDE0290 code fix to keep comments before removed syntax node (#69012) #69518
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Stop descending through tuple when no slot can be created #69513
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Unsplit `NullableWalker` after `out` argument #69511
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Fix TFM for function pointer expected output tests #69506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid binding lambda body if fully typed #69505
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69504
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Fix parsing of generics in casts. #69519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not convert immutable arrays on downlevel runtimes #69520
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pull out syntax helpers used in 'create collection initializer/collection' into utility types #69526
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move 'use object expression' fixer over to helper base class #69523
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • React to csharplang changes #69487
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [Port] Fix regression for suppressed diagnostics in Suggestion diagnostics tagger #69517
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, OnDeckForServicing
  • Share common code in 'use collection expression'. #69502
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce LOH allocations for SemanticToken classification in LSP #69496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update packages to prep for NuGet publish #69497
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code like `ImmutableArray.CreateBuilder<int>(); ...` to a collection expression. #69500
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Fix analyzer conflicts on Linux (#69406)" #69498
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery when encountering errant close-paren tokens. #69482
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2244264 #69366
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Implement support for emitting PrivateImplementationDetails to EnC deltas #69485
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IDE changes for analyzer loading #69470
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers, Backlog
  • Move csharp decompiler service down to features so it is available in vscode #69501
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Announcement] Preparing for the 8.0 release #50091
  • Scaffolding using Razor Pages using Entity Framework (CRUD) uses antiquated bootstrap classes #50090
  • JSON Change #50088
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #50087
  • Perf improvement: json #50086
  • ViewBag not working in .net8 preview 7 #50084
  • API review: Components SSR Forms #50078
    8.0-rc2
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc #50077
  • CS0433 The type 'IEmailSender' exists in both 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI and Microsoft.Extensions.Identity.Core #50075

Closed

  • Array of control references is not maintained on page renders after the first #49980
  • Perf regression: json #49782
  • Perf regression: json #49791
  • StateHasChanged starts a javascript before it is finished. #49994
  • In Blazor wasm, the overriden BuildRenderTree is not hit at all #49917
  • asp.net 8 preview 7 runtime exception #50082
  • API review: Component rendering to HTML outside Blazor hosting #50079
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mvc #49962
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, multiple_queries #50039

PullRequests

Created

  • Support resolving keyed services from DI in RDF and RDG #50095
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • Stateful Reconnect API changes #50092
    area-signalr
  • [DRAFT] Consider symlinks when watching certificate file paths #50074
    area-runtime
  • Update IdWeb 2.13.2 #50072
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50071
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 9.0-alpha1 #50063
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript
  • [SignalR] Pass new App to Transport Pipe to App layer #49650
    area-signalr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2244071 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50068
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to Load iOS Platform Specific Image #16768
  • Resize and Downsize function in W2DImage class is not implemented on windows #16767
  • Linking of native static library fails and the resulting package is including the native reference #16764
  • Deleted Android Foreground Service UI is not Re-instated #16761
  • Provide Static MauiContextAccessor #16759
    Backlog
  • UseMauiEmbedding extension does not use specified TApp #16757
    Under Consideration
  • Windows image localization papercut #16755
  • Windows Picker TextColor on PointerOver has no effect #16751
    Under Consideration
  • Shell ContentTemplate could not be created from non-default constructor DataTemplate #16747

Closed

  • [Testing] Modify our CI Template Tests so that TreatWarningsAsErrors is enabled #16709
    .NET 8 GA
  • WebView does not support setPointerCapture when mouse leaves the control #16727
  • AmbiguousMatchException when BindableProperty is hidden in a derived class and is then set in XAML #13962
    Under Consideration
  • Date format error for September #16728
  • [ VS & .NET 8 ] MAUI Android/iOS causes error and can't be built, .csproj file can't be shown #16008
    Backlog
  • The project doesn't know how to run the profile with name 'Windows Machine' and command 'MsixPackage'. #14862
  • MAUI Blazor Project Publish Bug #14732
  • CollectionView items have extra space on Windows #15492
    .NET 8
  • Improve feedback from UI Tests when failing to navigate to next test #16674
    Backlog
  • Touch scroll is not working in a scroll view when adding pinch gesture to the child. #5612
    Backlog
  • Obsolete FocusChangeRequested #14299
    Backlog
  • MAUI build fails on Nuget Restore Task on Azure Hosted Devops Agent #16745

PullRequests

Created

  • Tests: Add support for connected component analysis #16770
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Remove the explicit RID on Mac Catalyst samples #16765
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Default paths for Appium projects, to simplify run steps #16763
    area/testing
  • [windows] fix memory leak in ListView #16762
    area/ListView, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • MauiEmbedding extensions should use specified TApp type #16758
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Try and enable Windows device tests on net7.0 #16756
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Update VisualElement docs #16754
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • Streamline SwipeView Children #16753
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [windows] Fix Picker PointerOver TextColor (#16751) #16752
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker, Under Consideration

Merged

  • [tests] Enable TreatWarningsAsErrors=true #16766
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [UITest] Add reset to test teardown if the app is not running anymore #16769
    area/testing
  • [X] avoid AmbiguousMatchException #15873
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16690
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Picker #16685
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [UITest] Add more logging and restart in setup #16687
    area/testing
  • Obsolete VisualElement.FocusChangeRequested event #16750
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Document Brush & Colors #16738
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8 GA
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Don't force the RID to be x64 #16678
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Use the new device runners #16719
    area/testing
  • [Housekeeping] Review all the pending TODOs comments related with .NET 8 #16670
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Add a "VSCode" target to open the "maui.code-workspace". #16732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572

  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use ExecuteUpdate - from a dictionary with properties and values to be applied #31470

Closed

  • NRT metadata is not used for element type nullability #31416

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Update branding to 9.0-alpha1 #31465
